attributes.action: implement a ban on the trade of dog and cat fur from Asia to Europe.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The ban in the US now means that more dog and cat fur is likely to find its way into the EU and UK, therefore it is vital that a similar ban be introduced both here and in Europe.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
